page.title: 06HOME LIFE IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: A class survey of 25 boys aged 11/12 carried out on{home life in Hounslow produced the following facts:- The average{family size}was between four and six, although one boy came from a family of ten. Sixteen boys have one{pet}or more. Most boys help with jobs at home, although only ten make their own beds. All boys felt that their mums do the most{housework. In seven of the families surveyed there were{vegetarians}in the house. Most boys came from homes with between seven and ten rooms. Half the boys live in semi-detached houses, the next most popular housing was of the terraced type, one boy lives in a cottage.
